events.event_text: Can I please get confirmation that this is being worked on/resolved today?

events.subject: Re: (Case 23232) Dealing with made-up titles
events.event_text:
From: "G.O.B. Bluth" <getaway@capitolrecords.com>
Date: Tue, 04 Jun 2013 00:28:19 +0000 (GMT)
To: "Cloudant Support" <support@cloudant.com>
Cc: "Buster Bluth" <busterb@milford.edu>, "Tony Wonder" <tdubs@gothiccastle.com> 
Subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: (Case 18852) Request for setting up new cluster in Bundang  Samsung Infra

Hi, Rob

 

As we talked in irc, our infra team finished following RAID settings.

 

- 3rd node (192.168.100.13) RAID setting

   2 HDDs => RAID1 (mirroring),  /dev/sda,  3TB

  10 HDDs => RAID0 (w/o parity), /dev/sdb, 30TB

 

- your dev team needs to set up /dev/sda partition by themselves

  . 10GB for OS

  . the other volume (3TB - 10GB) for other purpose

 

Could you check it again and let us know what remains?

 

 

Regards,

 

BK.

 

 

곽병관 드림

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

 Byung-Kwan Kwak (nerguri)

 Senior Engineer

 Cloud Solution Team / Cloud Computing Lab.

 Software R&D Center

 Samsung Electronics

 e-mail: bk21.kwak@samsung.com <mailto:bk21.kwak@samsung.com>

 GTalk: nerguri@gmail.com

 mobile phone: +82 (10) 3772-6297

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

 

 

 

 

------- Original Message -------

Sender : Cloudant Support<support@cloudant.com>

Date : 2013-06-04 05:13 (GMT+09:00)

Title : Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: (Case 18852) Request for setting up new cluster in Bundang Samsung Infra

 

Hi BK,

Using the keyboard has proved to be prohibitively time consuming. Can we ask your infra team to configure the drives for us?

Please configure the drives on each node as follows:

Assign 2 drives to a mirror set (RAID1).

Assign the remaining drives to a stripe set without parity (RAID0).

This will present us with a mirrored /dev/sda for the system and software.  The stripe set will present as /dev/sdb for the storage of data.

Let us know if we need to clarify.

--
Rob O'Brien - Cloudant Support
